name: Jerrod X
description: I’m very active, outgoing, love to create fun, but do have a bit of a wild side that surfaces once I’m comfortable with you. Pretty much anything goes outdoors and around water! Love to surf, stand up paddling, hike, bike, tennis, lacrosse, sail, swim, especially surf!!! Enjoy movies, the theater and reading in bed. I am a hopeless romantic…love full moons, sunsets, walking barefoot in the sand, holding hands, romantic dinners at a restaurant, or at home, cooking together… cuddling, candles..and deep passionate kisses! I’m a little picky about my partner, but faithful, loyal and true once my choice is made! I’m searching for someone attractive, honest, sense of humor, caring and non-judgemental with a great sense of style. Chemistry is important
